OTHER_DOC: Report from National Social Security Fund for Civil Servants
DATA_COMP: Retirement and disability figures are recorded by the Retirement and Disability Data Management System by the reporting year.
INST_MANDATE: Ministry of Social Affairs, Veterans and Youth Rehabilitation
DATA_SOURCE: National Social Security Fund for Civil Servants
SOURCE_TYPE: Data System of National Social Security Fund for Civil Servants
STAT_CONC_DEF:
Retired is a retired civil servant who receives a monthly stipend provided by the state based on age 55 and older and 20 years of seniority.

Disability is a civil servant who can no longer work due to loss of professional ability and receives a monthly salary provided by the state and has a seniority of 20 years or more.
CONTACT_MAIL: No. 788 Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Boeng Trabek, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia
CONTACT_FUNCT: Chief of Bureau in charge of Statistics
CONTACT_ORGANISATION: Ministry of Social Affairs, Veterans and Youth Rehabilitation
SDG_SERIES_DESCR: 0.0.0 National series not in global framework (_)
SDG_TARGET: 10.4 Agree on policies, especially fiscal policy, salaries, social protection and achieve more equality
SDG_GOAL: 10. Reduce inequality in the country and among other countries
